title: Deadly Affair
description: He came into my life as my savior.All blood-soaked hands and deep blue eyes.But then he became so much more...he became my stalker.And now? Now he wants to put a ring on my finger and call me his wife.How could I possibly refuse when heâ€™s offering me my one chance at redemption?Some loves are worth sacrificing everything for.Even when they turn deadly.
author: K.A. Knight
